alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webb County through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Las Tiendas, or 21 miles west of Encinal, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ranchos Penitas West, Las Tiendas and Columbia Bridge. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 680 and 692. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
